title: Did i mess up?
content: In today's esa, when i was typing, i toggled some shortcut by mistake and a new tab opened.I assumed to have closed the window by mistake and I clicked on the assessment icon and proceeded to entire my login details, i was able to login and the answers which I had written were still there. I wrote the paper and submitted. Now, when i closed this window, there was the older window which I toggled out of by mistake it had no answers in it other than the few i had written before toggling and the timer was ticking, so i just closed the window and didn't submit it. I'm damn scared that I've messed up big time and my answers wouldn't have submitted.

comments.body: As far as ik each time you type anything in the answer box it is auto saved , unless you cleared the answer you had written you should not worry.
Thank You! This put me at ease. I hope all my answers were saved.
Wait you opened a different window and nothing happened to the assessment?????
Yeah a new tab opened,i didnt realise the old tab was open in the background. But, i was able to complete the exam and submit it.
So technically we could just open up a new tab and search for answers???
They can most probably monitor us
They would have maybe come upto you if they could no???
most probably it's because i didn't do anything on the new window other than click the assessment icon
Its all monitored lol. They can access which sites are being opened. Happened to a kid in my batch in first sem during ISAs, he had to leave the lab immediately.
Heard someone use a pendrive and copy, they took all slides and uploaded on the system
